definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: She continued on to Riyadh and Jeddah in Saudi Arabia.
sentences.chinese: 接着，她先後訪問了沙特阿拉伯的利雅得和吉達。

sentences.english: On the afternoon of April 23, Hu arrived in Dammam for a visit from Riyadh by special plane.
sentences.chinese: 23日下午，胡錦濤從利雅得乘專機抵達達曼訪問。

sentences.english: Hu arrived in Dammam for a visit by special plane from Riyadh on the afternoon of the same day.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤是於當天下午從利雅得乘專機抵達達曼訪問的。

sentences.english: Middle East press that he could just enjoying their later years in the Saudi capital Riyadh.
sentences.chinese: 中東媒體說，他正好可以在沙特首都利雅得頤養天年。

definition: Tripoli, capital of Libya/Tripoli, city in north Lebanon

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2

definition: Abu Dhabi, capital of United Arab Emirates (UAE)
